src_original: i … niṣaṇṇena punar āyur mayā labdham evaṁ śaraṇa buddhi … //
tgt_original: 我今於此會中聞於正法，以法力故增其智慧復增壽命。

src_original: asmiṁ khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe śakrasya devendrasya virajo vigatamalaṁ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam aśītīnāṁ ca devatāsahasrāṇām / atha śakro devendro
tgt_original: 」是時帝釋發是願已，遠塵離垢得法眼淨。 復有八萬天人，亦復獲得法眼清淨。

src_original: dṛṣṭadharmaḥ prāptadharmo viditadharmaḥ paryavagāḍhadharmas tīrṇakāṁkṣas tīrṇavicikitso ’parapratyayo ’nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāptaḥ /
tgt_original: 爾時，帝釋天主聞法見法而能了知，住法堅固，斷諸疑惑。

src_original: uttāyāsanād ekāṁsam uttarāsaṁgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenāṁjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat /
tgt_original: 如是證已，從座而起，偏袒右肩合掌頂禮而白佛言：

src_original: abhikrānto ’haṁ bhadanta abhikrānta eṣo ’haṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ
bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca / upāsakaṁ ca mān dhārayādyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇagatam abhiprasannam /
tgt_original: 從於今日盡其壽命，歸佛法僧，持優婆塞戒。

src_original: atha śakro devendraḥ paṁcaśikhaṁ gandharvaputram āmantrayati / upakaras tvaṁ tāta paṁcaśikhāsmākam upakaraś ca yo hi nāma tvaṁ bhagavantam //
tgt_original: 」爾時，帝釋天主即於佛前，迴語五髻乾闥婆王子言：
